sense.gloss: large, big, great, major, important, serious, heavy, loud
large, big, great, huge, vast, major, important, serious, severe
-sized, as big as, the size of
former imperial university of Japan (established under the ritsuryō system for the training of government administrators)
the Great Learning (one of the Four Books)
mass meeting, convention, rally, conference, assembly, gathering
serious matter, major incident, matter of grave concern, crisis
great undertaking, great enterprise, great thing
liking very much, loving (something or someone), adoring, being very fond of
safe, secure, sound, problem-free, without fear, all right, alright, OK, okay
no thanks, I'm good, that's alright
great man, fine figure of a man
x: 大丈夫・だいじょうふ

sense.gloss: large quantity, massive (quantity), mass (e.g. mass production, mass transit, mass destruction)
generally, on the whole, mostly, almost, nearly, approximately, roughly, about
outline, main points, gist, substance, essence
in the first place, first and foremost, from the start, to begin with
minister of state, cabinet minister (in Japan)
full-width cloth (approx. 72 cm wide for traditional Japanese clothing; approx. 140 cm wide for Western clothing)
force attacking the front of a castle
very, very much, greatly, considerably, highly, exceedingly, a great deal, a lot, to one's heart's content
crowd of people, great number of people
general situation, general trend, general tendency, way things are moving, current (of the times), tide (e.g. of public opinion)
huge, vast, enormous, colossal, extensive, large
to the maximum degree, to the full
large country, major nation, great power
province of the highest rank (ritsuryō system)
Ministry of the Treasury (under the ritsuryō system)
earth, ground, the solid earth, the (vast) land
considerable, great, important, significant, a big deal

sdata.j: ↑大抵↑↓たいてい↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓っている。
sdata.e: Most people think I'm crazy.

sdata.j: ↑大↑↓おお↓きくなったら↑王様↑↓おうさま↓になりたい。
sdata.e: When I grow up, I want to be a king.

sdata.j: ↑大丈夫↑↓だいじょうぶ↓、↑出来↑↓でき↓ますよ。
sdata.e: You can do it.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓ごみは↑大嫌↑↓だいきら↓い。
sdata.e: I hate it when there are a lot of people.

sdata.j: ↑大好↑↓だいす↓きだよ！
sdata.e: I love you.

sdata.j: ↑大好↑↓だいす↓き。
sdata.e: I love you.

sdata.j: ↑堅↑↓かた↓い↑書↑↓か↓き↑物↑↓もの↓は↑大嫌↑↓だいきら↓いだ。
sdata.e: I utterly despise formal writing!

sdata.j: あの↑蜘蛛↑↓くも↓が↑大嫌↑↓だいきら↓い。いつもそこにいて↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑掃除↑↓そうじ↓するときいらいらさせるの。
sdata.e: I hate those spiders. They're always there to freak me out when I'm cleaning.

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓は↑大変↑↓たいへん↓↑暑↑↓あつ↓い。
sdata.e: It is very hot today.

sdata.j: ↑高校↑↓こうこう↓↑時代↑↓じだい↓について↑最↑↓もっと↓も↑後悔↑↓こうかい↓することを↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓に↑尋↑↓たず↓ねると↑大抵↑↓たいてい↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑決↑↓き↓まってこう↑言↑↓い↓う。↑時間↑↓じかん↓を↑無駄↑↓むだ↓にしすぎていた、と。
sdata.e: When I ask people what they regret most about high school, they nearly all say the same thing: that they wasted so much time.

sdata.j: ラザニアが↑大好↑↓だいす↓きです。
sdata.e: I love lasagna.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はラザニアが↑大↑↓だい↓↑好物↑↓こうぶつ↓なんだ。
sdata.e: I love lasagna.

sdata.j: あなたにとってひらめきの↑最大↑↓さいだい↓の↑源↑↓みなもと↓は↑何↑↓なに↓？
sdata.e: What is your greatest source of inspiration?

sdata.j: あなたは↑彼↑↓かれ↓と↑大学↑↓だいがく↓で↑会↑↓あ↓いましたか。
sdata.e: You met him at the university?

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓の↑頃↑↓ころ↓は、↑周↑↓まわ↓りのものが↑何↑↓なに↓でも↑大↑↓おお↓きく↑見↑↓み↓えるものだ。
sdata.e: When we are small, everything seems so big.

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓こんにち↓、↑象↑↓ぞう↓は↑現存↑↓げんそん↓する↑最↑↓もっと↓も↑大↑↓おお↓きい↑陸生↑↓りくせい↓↑動物↑↓どうぶつ↓である。
sdata.e: Elephants are the largest land animals alive today.

sdata.j: ↑体↑↓からだ↓を↑大事↑↓だいじ↓にしなさい。
sdata.e: Take good care of yourself.

sdata.j: ↑大↑↓たい↓したことじゃないんだから。
sdata.e: It's not important.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑偉大↑↓いだい↓だとおもってはならない。
sdata.e: You must not look upon him as great.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑寛大↑↓かんだい↓な↑性格↑↓せいかく↓に↑付↑↓つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓むべきではない。
sdata.e: You should not play on his generous nature.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑寛大↑↓かんだい↓な↑性格↑↓せいかく↓に↑付↑↓つ↓け↑込↑↓こ↓まない↑方↑↓ほう↓がよい。
sdata.e: You had better not play on his generous nature.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑大変↑↓たいへん↓↑読書↑↓どくしょ↓↑力↑↓りょく↓がある。
sdata.e: Your reading is very advanced.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑大麦↑↓おおむぎ↓と↑小麦↑↓こむぎ↓の↑区別↑↓くべつ↓ができますか。
sdata.e: Can you tell wheat from barley?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑大変↑↓たいへん↓↑青白↑↓あおじろ↓い↑顔↑↓かお↓をしている。
sdata.e: You look very pale.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑大↑↓たい↓したものだ。
sdata.e: I'm proud of you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑大↑↓おお↓きな↑危険↑↓きけん↓を↑冒↑↓おか↓しながら、↑彼↑↓かれ↓に↑任↑↓まか↓せている↑事↑↓こと↓になる。
sdata.e: You're running a big risk in trusting him.

sdata.j: ↑大人↑↓おとな↓になったら↑何↑↓なに↓になりたい？
sdata.e: What do you want to be when you grow up?

sdata.j: ↑大↑↓おお↓きくなったら↑何↑↓なに↓になりたいですか。
sdata.e: What do you want to be when you grow up?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑大↑↓おお↓きくなったら↑何↑↓なん↓になりたいの？

sdata.j: あなたは↑大↑↓おお↓きくなったら、↑何↑↓なに↓になりたいですか。
